content: द्रुह् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (द्रुह्यति, द्रुग्ध) {@--1@} To bear malice or hatred. {@--2@} To seek to hurt or injure, plot maliciously or revengefully, meditate mischief; (generally with the <ab>dat.</ab> of the object of hatred); यान्वेति मां द्रुह्यति मह्यमेव सात्रेत्युपालंभि तयालिवर्गः <ls>N. 3. 7</ls>; <ls>Bk. 4. 39.</ls>

द्रुह् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) (<ab>Nom.</ab> <ab>sing.</ab> ध्रुक्-ग्, ध्रुट्-ड्) Injuring, hurting, plotting or acting as an enemy against; <ls>Śi. 2. 35</ls>; <ls>Ms. 5. 90.</ls> {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} Injury, damage.
